method.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Lightly line and grease a 20 cm round cake tin.
Halve the passion fruit. Scoop out the pulp and blend with the banana.
Cream the butter, or margarine, and sugar together until soft and light.
Gradually beat in the eggs. Add the flour. Fold in the fruit mixture and the milk.
Spoon into the cake tin. bake for 25-35 min until firm to the touch. Turn out and place onto a wire cooling tray.
Meanwhile, halve the remaining passion fruit, scoop out the flesh and blend with the cream and icing sugar.
When cake is cool, spread the fruit and cream over the top of the cake and top with the strawberries. Serve in slices.
